short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension allows you to generate a compliment.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The user will be prompted with a home screen that welcomes them to the extension. From there, the user can enter a number between 1-7. Each number corresponds to a day of the week. Once a number is entered, a corresponding compliment to the user will pop up. As an example, the compliment "you're so dextrous" demonstrates how the extension can boost the user's self-confidence.
